Committee: Cultural Affairs, Tourism, Parks And Recreation

Milestones.Committee: Cultural Affairs, Tourism, Parks And Recreation

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

Title: Relates to establishing the New York state passport to the parks pilot program
Summary: Establishes the New York state passport to the parks pilot program, which helps to educate individuals on the parks located within the state and encourages individuals to go visit each park.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Add ยง3.27, Pks & Rec L; add ยง99-hh, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing the New York state passport to the parks pilot program; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
